bookTable.title: You can invite your friends to lunch or book a table

dialog.title: Book Table
dialog.bookingError: Error booking, please try again later

formErrors.nameRequired: Required. Please insert a name to reserve the table
formErrors.emailRequired: Required. Please insert an email to reserve the table
formErrors.emailPattern: Insert a valid email address to send reservation data. e.g. email@email.com.
formErrors.assistantsRequired: Required. Please insert the number of assistants.
formErrors.assistantsMax: You cannot reserve more assistants than the size of the biggest table (8), if you need more tables, make more bookings.
formErrors.assistantsMin: You cannot reserve an empty or negative number of assistants
